summary.title: Professional Summary
summary.content: Versatile and visionary Arabic language educator with over 13 years of experience, blending curriculum leadership, digital innovation, and inclusive pedagogy. Proven success in guiding curriculum planning, designing targeted intervention programs, and leading teams to consistently achieve high student outcomes aligned with MoE/ADEK frameworks. Certified Microsoft Innovative Educator with deep expertise in leveraging technology to personalize instruction and inspire academic achievement.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Dedicated to Excellence in Arabic Language Education

introduction.title: My Story
introduction.content: Versatile and visionary Arabic language educator with over 13 years of experience, blending curriculum leadership, digital innovation, and inclusive pedagogy. Proven success in guiding curriculum planning, designing targeted intervention programs, and leading teams to consistently achieve high student outcomes aligned with MoE/ADEK frameworks. Committed to promoting UAE National Identity and fostering a culture of integrity, wellbeing, and lifelong learning.

education.title: Education
education.degree: Bachelor's Degree in Arabic Language and Literature

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Leveraging cutting-edge educational technology to enhance learning outcomes

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: Striving for the highest standards in curriculum delivery and student achievement

inclusion.title: Inclusion
inclusion.description: Creating accessible learning environments that celebrate diversity

vision.title: My Vision
vision.quote: Blending curriculum leadership, digital innovation, and inclusive pedagogy to inspire excellence in every learner.

curriculum.title: Curriculum Excellence
curriculum.description: Expert alignment with MoE/ADEK frameworks, IB PYP standards, and international best practices. Spearheaded inspection preparation efforts with IB, Cognia, NEASC, and ADEK, contributing to multiple accreditations and 'Very Good' ratings.

digital.title: Digital Innovation
digital.description: Certified Microsoft Innovative Educator with deep expertise in educational technology. Successfully implemented Toddle LMS across multiple campuses and achieved global recognition on BravoBravo and iReadArabic platforms.

datadriven.title: Data-Driven Results
datadriven.description: Proven track record of measurable improvements. Increased student attainment from 75% to 96.5% within one academic year through strategic, data-informed interventions and targeted support programs.

story1.title: BravoBravo Global Leadership
story1.description: Ranked 1st globally among 180 schools with 68,000+ stories read, demonstrating exceptional digital literacy engagement.

story2.title: iReadArabic Excellence
story2.description: Achieved 2nd place locally (100+ schools) and 3rd place globally (300+ schools) in Arabic reading proficiency.

story3.title: Toddle LMS Implementation
story3.description: Led successful system-wide rollout as Steering Committee member, providing strategic guidance and curriculum alignment across ENS campuses.

position1.title: MoE Subjects Lead
position1.description: Provided professional leadership and support for curriculum implementation, instructional effectiveness, and student achievements in MoE Subjects.
achievements: Spearheaded school-wide initiatives that led to doubling students' reading engagement on BravoBravo App
Story count rising from 14,000 to 31,000+ resulting in a leap in students' Attainment
21% increase in student attainment with 83% of students meeting or exceeding expected progress in Arabic Benchmarks

achievements: BravoBravo: Ranked 1st globally among 180 schools with 68,000+ stories read
